name: v1.38.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_features", version = "1.38.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "07271d0f6b12633777b69020c4cb1eb67b1939c0cf84bb3944dc85cc250c0c01",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.38.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.38.0/bazel_features-v1.38.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Add 'merkle_cache_v2' feature by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/118


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.37.0...v1.38.0

name: v1.37.0
body:

## Using WORKSPACE

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.36.0...v1.37.0



## What's Changed
* feat: add feature to indicate availability of runfiles with arbitrary characters by @mark-thm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/79

## New Contributors
* @mark-thm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/79

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.19.0...v1.20.0

name: v1.19.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_features", version = "1.19.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "3646ffd447753490b77d2380fa63f4d55dd9722e565d84dfda01536b48e183da",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.19.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.19.0/bazel_features-v1.19.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Add `CcSharedLibraryHintInfo` and update version for `CcSharedLibraryInfo` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/76
* feat: detect stardoc output change by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/75


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.18.0...v1.19.0

name: v1.9.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark

```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark

    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "d7787da289a7fb497352211ad200ec9f698822a9e0757a4976fd9f713ff372b3",
```

* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/50
* Fix "same major version" check logic by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/52


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.9.0...v1.9.1
